title: coinguybri
author: coinguybri
content: Can no longer make it this year  so I need to sell my ticket.Ticket: Industry PassDates: May 18-20 2023.Current Retail: $1,899 (Can negotiate on price)DM me here, but prefer telegram https://t.me/coinGuyBriTicket Details:SIGNATURE EXPERIENCEAccess to All 3 Days of Bitcoin 2023Exclusive access to Industry DayAccess to Investor and Founders at Pitch DayExclusive access to Official Networking AppExclusive access to Official Networking LoungeExclusive access to Cleanspark Mining LoungeAccess to official Industry Press conferenceComplimentary coffee in loungesDedicated Networking BadgesFREE 2 month Bitcoin Magazine Pro SubscriptionPriority Registration for Industry Pass HoldersTicket: Industry Pass allows you to also visit the first day of the conference and also some more exclusive stuff to do on the conference.To find out more about the conference and the ticket visit: https://b.tc/conference/#tickets

comments.author: coinguybri
comments.body: Need to sell any offers?Quote from: coinguybri on April 01, 2023, 08:43:40 AMCan no longer make it this year  so I need to sell my ticket.Ticket: Industry PassDates: May 18-20 2023.Current Retail: $1,899 (Can negotiate on price)DM me here, but prefer telegram https://t.me/coinGuyBri
